definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Niamey is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 尼亞美是首都及最大城市。

sentences.english: Government in Niger have attacked the main prison in the capital Niamey.
sentences.chinese: 尼日爾政府襲擊了首都尼亞美的主要監獄。
